ygData.subject: Re: Looking for a little advice for the low 20s
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Excellent explanation, John(tm). Basic EQ mechanics at work.  Anything that seems complex is only a subset of smaller less complex things making the
ygData.messageBody:
> Your puller goes in, gets these mobs (or any mobs that were
> "told" about you by the stuck mob). He is inside their "give
> up" radius but you are not, so they chase him. He pulls them
> to your group. Eventually, both you and he are inside their
> "give up" radius, but you are tops on their hate list. So
> they all go after you.

Excellent explanation, John(tm).

Basic EQ mechanics at work. Anything that seems complex is
only a subset of smaller less complex things making the siutation
bigger or more confusing than it really is.

Harmonic.
